_header: As a great doctor says till us
Title(s): Scottish Legendary; The Life of Placidas
Subjects: Eustace, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: The Life of Placidas (St Eustace) in the Scottish Legendary — in couplets

CULGg26.First Lines:
as a gret doctore sais til wslat penance is rycht
                    perolouse…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…out of þis warld þat I wynebut schame det &
                    dedly syne

             Barbours des schottischen Nationaldichters Legendensammlung.

Metcalfe,  William Musham,
                        ed.

         13, 18, 23, 25, 35, 37. Edinburgh, London: Blackwood, 1896: 2.69-98.
